resources.string: The usage of accessibility service for reading Question and Options from the app screen when these are appear to users.\n

Works with Version LOCO 2.1.9 or older version ,Qureka latest version, HQ 1.6.2,The Question,SwagIQ 1.2.5 or older WE Show, BrainBazzi ,MobShow, JusPlay , Swoo \nGive necessary permission to this app and then Press "START" Button\nAdd this app to Ignore Optimization and to AUTO START for better result,without this ,accessibility service might be killed
When primary search fails then app will use alternative way to find answer
